title: Help! Identify handwriting font
content:
Does anyone know what this handwriting font is from this magazine cover? It's the pink "love your home" text. I've searched everywhere and haven't been successful. Thanks!!!

Font: 

 Courtney Dorkling 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317070919/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-08-19 at 10.31.02 AM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317070919/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-08-19%20at%2010.31.02%20AM.png) | 72.58 KB |
author: colleen81

comments.content: Looks like [Courtney Dorkling](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317070919/http:/www.kevinandamanda.com/fonts/freescrapbookfonts/courtney-dorkling), a free scrapbook font by Kenvin & Amanda.
